full.description: Whether there is a gap between the card and the sides of the screen
full.description_zh: 卡片与屏幕两侧是否留空隙

title.description: The header to the left of the head

sub-title.description: The subtitle to the right of the head

border.description: Whether or not to display a border

index.description: Used to identify the first few cards clicked
index.description_zh: 用于标识点击了第几个卡片

margin.description: The spacing between the card and the two sides of the screen and the upper and lower elements needs to be in units, such as "30rpx 20rpx", see the instructions above
margin.description_zh: 卡片与屏幕两边和上下元素的间距，需带单位，如"30rpx 20rpx"，见上方说明

border-radius.description: The value of the rounded corners of the card as a whole, in rpx
border-radius.description_zh: 卡片整体的圆角值，单位rpx

head-style.description_zh: 头部自定义样式，对象形式

body-style.description_zh: 主体自定义样式，对象形式

foot-style.description_zh: 底部自定义样式，对象形式

head-border-bottom.description: Whether to display the lower border of the head
head-border-bottom.description_zh: 是否显示头部的下边框

foot-border-top.description: Whether to display the upper border at the bottom
foot-border-top.description_zh: 是否显示底部的上边框

thumb.description: Thumbnail paths, such as those set will be displayed to the left of the title, and relative paths are not recommended
thumb.description_zh: 缩略图路径，如设置将显示在标题的左边，不建议使用相对路径

thumb-width.description: The width of the thumbnail, higher than the width, in rpx
thumb-width.description_zh: 缩略图的宽度，高等于宽，单位rpx

thumb-circle.description: Whether the thumbnail is round or not

padding.description: Give the padding of the head, body, and foot, see the instructions above, in rpx
padding.description_zh: 给head，body，foot部的内边距，见上方说明，单位rpx

show-head.description: Whether or not to show the head

show-foot.description: Whether or not to display the tail

box-shadow.description: The outer shadow of the card, in the form of a string
box-shadow.description_zh: 卡片外围阴影，字符串形式

events.name: click
events.description: Triggered when the entire card is clicked anywhere
events.description_zh: 整个卡片任意位置被点击时触发
events.params: index: 用户传递的标识符

events.name: head-click
events.description: Triggered when the card header is clicked
events.description_zh: 卡片头部被点击时触发
events.params: index: 用户传递的标识符

events.name: body-click
events.description: Triggered when the main part of the card is clicked
events.description_zh: 卡片主体部分被点击时触发
events.params: index: 用户传递的标识符

events.name: foot-click
events.description: Triggered when the bottom part of the card is clicked
events.description_zh: 卡片底部部分被点击时触发
events.params: index: 用户传递的标识符

slots.name: head
slots.description: Customize the content of the card header

slots.name: body
slots.description: Customize the content of the main body of the card
slots.description_zh: 自定义卡片主体部分内容

slots.name: foot
slots.description: Customize the bottom part of the card
slots.description_zh: 自定义卡片底部部分内容
